methods.name: CreateFlags
methods.description: Combines two flags and returns resulting flag

methods.name: StringFromUriObject
methods.description: Convert uri to string

methods.name: StringToUriObject
methods.description: Converts string to uri

methods.name: InitialDir
methods.description: Returns uri which can be used as Initial Dir in SAF picker

methods.name: OpenDocumentTree
methods.description: Prompts user to select a document tree

methods.name: OpenSingleDocument
methods.description: Prompts user to select a single file

methods.name: TakePersistableUriPermission
methods.description: Take a persistable URI permission grant that has been offered. Once taken, the permission grant will be remembered across device reboots.

methods.name: IsTreeUri
methods.description: Returns whether given uri is a tree uri

methods.name: IsDocumentUri
methods.description: Returns whether given uri is a document uri

methods.name: IsChildDocumentUri
methods.description: Returns whether second uri is child of first uri

methods.name: GetTreeDocumentId
methods.description: Returns document id of tree uri (should be either tree uri itself or a direct child uri)

methods.name: GetDocumentId
methods.description: Returns document id of an uri (should only be grand child)

methods.name: BuildDocumentUriUsingTree
methods.description: Builds document uri using tree uri and document id

methods.name: BuildChildDocumentsUriUsingTree
methods.description: Builds child documents id using tree (documents which is child of parent document) uri and its parent document id

methods.name: GetDisplayName
methods.description: Returns display name of given document uri

methods.name: GetSize
methods.description: Returns size (in bytes) of given document uri

methods.name: GetLastModifiedTime
methods.description: Returns last modified time (epoch) of given document uri

methods.name: GetMimeType
methods.description: Returns mime type of given document uri

methods.name: IsCopySupported
methods.description: Returns whether document can be copied or not

methods.name: IsMoveSupported
methods.description: Returns whether document is movable or not

methods.name: IsDeleteSupported
methods.description: Returns whether document is deletable or not

methods.name: IsRenameSupported
methods.description: Returns whether document is deletable or not

methods.name: CreateDocument
methods.description: Creates a new and empty document.If document already exists then an incremental value will be suffixed.

methods.name: WriteToFile
methods.description: Writes content as text to given uri

methods.name: WriteAsHexString
methods.description: Writes content as HEX to given uri

methods.name: WriteAsByteArray
methods.description: Writes byte array to given document

methods.name: DeleteDocument
methods.description: Tries to delete document from given uri and returns result

methods.name: ReadFromFile
methods.description: Reads from given document as text

methods.name: ReadAsByteArray
methods.description: Reads content of document as byte array

methods.name: ReadAsHexString
methods.description: Reads content of document as HEX string

methods.name: IsReadGranted
methods.description: Returns whether read is available for given uri

methods.name: ReleasePermission
methods.description: Relinquish a persisted URI permission grant

methods.name: IsWriteGranted
methods.description: Returns whether write is available for given uri

methods.name: ListFiles
methods.description: Tries to list files from given dir

methods.name: CopyDocument
methods.description: Tries to copy document from source uri to target dir

methods.name: MoveDocument
methods.description: Tries to move document from source uri to target dir

methods.name: RenameDocument
methods.description: Tries to rename a document and returns updated uri

methods.name: CopyDocumentToASD
methods.description: Tries to copy document from source uri to ASD

methods.name: ConvertStringToBytes
methods.description: Converts text to bytes and return Byte Array object. It is used with 'WriteAsByteArray' method.

blockProperties.name: DocumentDirMimeType
blockProperties.description: Returns mime type of document dir

name: SAF
helpString:
Extension to access files using Storage Access Framework
Developed by Sunny Gupta

events.name: ErrorOccurred
events.description: Event indicating error/exception has occurred and returns origin method and error message.

events.name: DocumentCreated
events.description: Event invoked after creating document.Returns document's uri if operation was successful else returns error message

events.name: GotWriteResult
events.description: Event invoked after writing to document.Returns document's uri if operation was successful else returns error message

events.name: GotReadResult
events.description: Event invoked after reading from document.Returns content if operation was successful else returns error message

events.name: GotUri
events.description: Event invoked when user selects a document or tree from SAF file picker

events.name: GotFilesList
events.description: Event invoked after getting files list

events.name: GotCopyResult
events.description: Event invoked after getting copy document result.Response will be target document's uri if operation was successful else returns error message

events.name: GotMoveResult
events.description: Event invoked after getting move document result.Response will be target document's uri if operation was successful else returns error message
